name: Astro Pigeon
description:
Hello this project is for the  game jam: "Beginners Circle Jam # 3".
We are beginners in game development and we had some problems in the development of this project but we learned a lot from it. We hope to be able to develop more games and participate in other jams! :)


Synopsis:
Astro Pigeon has an important mission to fight against enemy forces from other planets!
 


Controls:
 Right Key -> (shoot)
 / Space key (Flappy)

Developers:
Programmer: Marcos Paulo (marcos.sonete@gmail.com)

Artist: Sérgio Emanuel (emanuellsergio05@gmail.com)
